summary: Instead of the sound of kicking a can,  choose from a range of kickass quake vocals.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=20]

[img]http://i233.photobucket.com/albums/ee207/R4zorM4n/Criticalsounds.png[/img]

[font=\"Impact\"]QUAKE Critical Sounds[/font]

[/size][/u][/b]

Much more satisfying kill sounds for your Crit hits, with a range to choose from.

[line]
[b]INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS[/b]

1. Open the .zip and choose the sound you want to use for critical

2. Extract the Data file into your Program files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim and merge with data folder and overwrite when prompted. 
[line]

[line]
[b]NOTES[/b]

This will ONLY interfere with with other audio mods that modify that critical hit sounds, if you have mods that do this, this will ONLY modify the critical hit sounds so installing will only replace one sound.
[line]

[line]
[b]UNINSTALLATION[/b]

Delete \"ui_sneakattack_01\" found in \"Data\\sound\\fx\\ui\"

[b][color=red]WARNING:[/color][/b]
Not tested personally with NMM, manual install is recommended

Another user confirmed to work with NMM but will default to \"Wicked Sick\"
[line]

[size=5][b]Please endorse this mod and leave a comment if you enjoy it![/b][/size]
[/center]
author: NuclearFuzion
